Module javaNeuralNetwork.main
Package neural_network.util

Class Plotter

java.lang.Object
neural_network.util.Plotter
public class Plotter extends Object
Class to create plots evaluating the performance of the neural network. This class uses the org.knowm.xchart library to create the plots.

      public Plotter()

  • Method Details

    • datapointScatter

      public static void datapointScatter(NavigableMap<Header,List<String>> df, String phase, String title, boolean regression) throws IOException
      Creates a scatter plot of the predicted/true classes for a given set of data.
      Parameters:
      df - The data containing datapoints with true or predicted values.
      phase - The phase of learning (training/validation/testing) or "true" for the true data.
      title - The title of the plot.
      regression - Whether this is for regression or classification data.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • organiseDataByCategory

      static NavigableMap<String,List<List<Double>>> organiseDataByCategory(NavigableMap<Header,List<String>> df, Header yHeader)
      Takes in a categorical df from the Learning phases and then creates a new df keyed by the category names, with x1 and x2 data inside.
      Parameters:
      df - Categorical frame returned by a Learner.
      yHeader - Whether we look for true (Y) or predicted (Y_HAT) classes.
      Returns:
      The new dataframe.

    • comparisonScatter

      public static void comparisonScatter(NavigableMap<Header,List<Double>> df, String phase, String title) throws IOException
      Creates a scatter plot comparing the true and predicted values from the network. This method is for regression only. The classification equivalent is tester.generateConfusion().
      Parameters:
      df - The numerical dataframe from a regression problem.
      phase - The phase of learning (training/validation/testing).
      title - The title of the plot.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • plotLoss

      public static void plotLoss(Map<String,List<Double>> lossDf, String title) throws IOException
      Plots (normally) the training and validation losses over time.
      Parameters:
      lossDf - The loss data.
      title - A title for the plot.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • setDirName

      public static void setDirName(String dirName)
      Setter for dirName.
      Parameters:
      dirName - The overall directory for all plots to reside in.

    • setShowPlots

      public static void setShowPlots(boolean showPlots)
      Setter for showPlots.
      Parameters:
      showPlots - Whether we show plots on execution or not.

      static void setChart(org.knowm.xchart.XYChart chart)

      Parameters:
      chart - The chart instance from org.knowm.xchart.
